moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Dire Hit
moves.effect: Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch.

passives.name: Sand Shelter
passives.description: Protects the user from damage from a sandstorm.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 1
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
